text: that's like sending an email to alert of a network failure - from within the partition;-)
<@U0KPFAZNF> <@U0UHG4VP1> - is there anything I can do to have the sandbox build going for Version 0.6 for Power ?
<@U12V3D2P2>: what do you mean by going?

I think a new sandbox Jenkins job has to be created to have a build with Version 0.6, it could be a one time build - but the goal here is to have docker images uploaded for Power for Version 0.6(we have only baseimage now, not peer and membersrvc images)
Ramesh tried a sandbox build before but it was a test build, it didn't upload images
Is there a reason not to do this in production?
hi <@U12V3D2P2> <@U0UHG4VP1>: this is a continuation of that conversation about the v0.6 branch
the P/Z teams are asking for v0.6.1-preview releases in dockerhub, but I dont think we have a production job that would be capable of this
we could, of course, create one
but it seems easier to drive from sandbox, thus my suggestion
Are we going to be pushing these regularly? Could I rework a production job to make it work?
My gut? No. v0,6 is frozen afaict
That said, this does seem to keep coming up ;)

My big motivator to doing this in production is staging is now properly (as designed) being purged of all jobs every week. If we're going to need this after this week, that data entry would need to happen again.
If this is OK, I can add the dockerhub stuff back into staging to enable this
